sen.j: 藤原棟世（ふじわら の むねよ、生没年不詳）は、平安時代の貴族。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Muneyo (dates of birth and death unknown) was a court noble during the Heian period.
FUJIWARA no Muneyo (dates of birth and death unknown) was a court noble during the Heian period.
FUJIWARA no Muneyo (dates of birth and death unknown) was a court noble during the Heian period.

sen.j: 藤原南家・藤原保方の子で、清少納言の夫。
sen.e: He was a son of FUJIWARA no Yasukata of the Fujiwara Minami family and Seisho Nagon's husband.
sen.cmt: 藤原保方の読み方が不明です。
sen.e: He was a son of FUJIWARA no Yasukata of the Fujiwara Minami family and Seisho Nagon's husband.
He was a son of FUJIWARA no Yasukata of the Southern House of the Fujiwara clan and Sei Shonagon's husband.
sen.cmt: 藤原南家 - the Southern House of the Fujiwara clan（用語統一リストより）Sei Shonagonに訂正しました。

sen.e: He was KOUMA no Myoubu's father.
He was KOUMA no Myoubu's father.
He was KOUMA no Myobu's father.

sen.j: 筑前国守・山城国守・摂津国守などを歴任した。
sen.e: He served as the governor of Echizen, Yamashiro and Settsu Provinces.
He served as the governor of Echizen, Yamashiro and Settsu Provinces.
He served as the governor of Echizen, Yamashiro and Settsu Provinces.
